downloadTitle: Microsoft R Open 3.2.2 for Revolution R Enterprise 8.0.1
downloadDescription: Microsoft R Open is a free, complete open source platform for statistical analysis and data science. It includes the open source distribution of R 3.2.2 as well as some enhanced R features, and supports a variety of big data statistics, predictive modeling, and machine learning capabilities.
detailsSection:
R is the world’s most powerful programming language for statistical computing, machine learning, and graphics, with a thriving global community of users, developers, and contributors. Microsoft R Open is provided by Microsoft to support R development using Revolution R Enterprise for scalable, distributed R solutions.
This download contains the installer for the current release of Microsoft R Open for 64-bit Windows (MRO-3.2.2-for-RRE-8.0.1). When you install Microsoft R Open, you can easily build R packages using your own custom code, or use additional packages that you download from CRAN.
Microsoft R Open is a prerequisite for installing Revolution R Enterprise 8.0. Although the enterprise tools are not required for basic R package development, Revolution R Enterprise lets you create R packages that can use parallel processing and run in a scalable environment. You can use Microsoft R Open and Revolution R Enterprise to connect to an instance of SQL Server 2016 that has enabled the Advanced Analytic Extensions, and execute your R packages in SQL Server. This provides far greater memory for your R solutions as well as the convenience of in-database analytics. You can also use Microsoft R Open to develop solutions that run in Microsoft R Server.
systemRequirementsSection:
• .NET Framework 3.5 (includes 2.0) is required before installation
  • Disk space (local drive only; network drive not supported): 350 MB
  • Memory: 4GB of RAM is recommended
This download and Revolution R Enterprise are both required for using SQL Server R Services. Be sure to choose the version that matches the version of SQL Server R Services. This release is intended to be used with SQL Server 2016 RC0 and higher. If you are using SQL Server 2016 CTP 3.0, 3.1, or 3.2, you should install Revolution R Open instead (https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=49525)
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download and run the installer for Microsoft R Open 3.2.2 for Revolution R Enterprise 8.0.1.
  2. Follow-the on-screen prompts. By default, the installer installs both the R runtime and the open source components.
  3. Optionally, click this link to immediately begin downloading the modified GPL/LGPL \source code ((http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=733422- 126MB). This is made available in compliance with the GNU General Public License, but is not required to install or use Microsoft R Open.
  4. After installation of MRO is complete, download and install Revolution R Enterprise 8.0.1.
Notes
To use SQL Server R Services, you must also enable the feature, Advanced Analytics Extensions in SQL Server 2016 RC0. For more information, see the setup instructions in Books Online.
